text: This bloodforged edifice draws on the wrath of Khorne to drive demoralised enemies into a blind fury.
This Ruinous monument draws on the power of the Blood God to shatter the armour of their enemies.
This blasphemous totem wracks weakened enemies with surges of agonising pain, sapping their will to fight even further.
This barricade will block the path of attackers. It has high health and allows defending infantry to climb over it.
This barricade will buff defenders moving and fighting within its range.
This barricade will block the path of attackers. It can be docked and allows defending infantry to climb over it.
This barricade will hinder attackers moving and fighting within its range.
Defenders can place down bastion artillery to defend the walls.
While a unit is occupying the tower's capture point, it will fire on nearby enemies.
Allows passage to and from the settlement
Pours boiling oil onto nearby enemies
Slow firing rate, low damage, reasonable accuracy
Fast firing rate, low damage, reasonable accuracy
This settlement is yours and you will fight till the end to defend it.
